#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Have a Memorable Birthday
#Text=Everybody hopes to have a memorable birthday , so why not make that a reality ?
#Text=After all , our birthday memories tend to hold a special place in our hearts .
#Text=Want to make your upcoming birthday something you can look back on with fondness ?
#Text=You can easily make that dream come true .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Choosing the Perfect Destination
#Text=Choose a site in nature .
#Text=For making your birthday a memorable one , you need to do something different .
#Text=Start with a perfect place where you can celebrate !

#Text=Try choosing a beautiful hill station , or a station by the side of the waterfalls , which will completely change and cheer up your mood , and a place where you can enjoy the eternal beauty of nature .
#Text=By celebrating your birthday there , you will get the completely awesome experience that you want to have !
#Text=Throwing a party at a restaurant is another common way that we choose to celebrate our birthdays .
#Text=Thus , we get the same experience .
#Text=By having a change in the way of celebration , you get a different experience and perhaps a memorable one !
#Text=Decide on the place at least 20 days before your birthday event , so that you get enough time for other preparations .
#Text=Avoid party halls .
#Text=Maybe you have decided on the place ( say a hill station ) and you are celebrating there at a restaurant .
#Text=Do n't celebrate there in the party hall ! Choose a place from where you can see the picturesque scenes of nature .
#Text=Remember that fun and enjoyment , in your unique celebration , is linked with nature , so make sure you are n't celebrating away from it .
#Text=Many restaurants have such arrangements where you can enjoy the nature too , along with your celebration .
#Text=Although you will go at a perfect natural destination , celebrating at a party hall wo n't give you the different experience that you want to have .
#Text=Keep this in mind when deciding on a destination .
#Text=Decide on the right time .
#Text=If you like to celebrate at night , you may go with that .
#Text=Usually , people like to celebrate their birthday at night , but if you want to have something different , go with a party in the daytime .
#Text=Giving Out Invitations
#Text=Decide whom to invite .
#Text=Usually , we prefer to invite our friends and family .
#Text=In order to have a good and quality time with everybody , choose to invite only the people who can make you happy and comfortable .
#Text=Inviting someone just for the sake of formality does n't work .
#Text=The only person who is concerned about your birthday is you , so invite only those whom you really want to have with you on your birthday .
#Text=Inviting people unwillingly will just spoil your mood and you wo n't be able to enjoy anything .
#Text=Create a card .
#Text=By using a card rather than inviting people via the phone or email , you can have beautifully illustrated cards that will entice people to join you in your celebration .
#Text=Decorating and Getting Food
#Text=Set up a daytime party .
#Text=Since you are celebrating at a natural destination , you do n't need much decoration .
#Text=Your background should already be full of beauties of nature !
#Text=If you want to give off a birthday feeling , you can use balloons of your favorite colors , but do n't just stick them anywhere .
#Text=You can just fly them in the sky ( use balloons that fly high in the sky ) .
#Text=You will really enjoy it , and your party guests will also love the scenes and will ultimately enjoy it .
#Text=Set up a nighttime party .
#Text=You can use beautiful night lamps , lanterns , or balloons that light up .
#Text=Again , do n't stick them in the sky ; let them fly in the sky and enjoy the lovely scene !
#Text=Choose a different dish .
#Text=Choose a dish that is new , and something that everybody will love to have .
#Text=You can have a wide variety of dishes and delicacies !
#Text=Make sure that you have something sweet and delicious to serve .
#Text=For example , you can have the yummy and delicious Italian Gelato that will add sweetness to everything !
#Text=If you have decided to have some games for fun , then do n't plan a heavy dish .
#Text=If you do , nobody will want to play the games after having food .
#Text=In that case , you can have light snacks .
#Text=Add a cake and candles .
#Text=A birthday is incomplete without cake and candles ! Have a printed cake that would attract everybody 's attention to the cake .
#Text=Have a flavor that everybody will certainly enjoy .
#Text=Have different candles that will probably catch everybody 's attention .
#Text=Do a good deed .
#Text=Try distributing your old toys and clothes among the children of an orphanage , or any other random act of kindness .
#Text=By doing this , you will really get that satisfaction and peace that one gets after doing an act like this .
#Text=If you have an environment-friendly nature , then plant trees and help save the environment .
#Text=Remember that happiness increases when you make others happy !
#Text=Tips
#Text=Make sure that your arrangements and ways are decided at least five days before your birthday .
#Text=Believe in doing something different and you will surely love the change !
#Text=Make others happy on your birthday and you will ultimately be happy yourself !
#Text=Enjoy everything and do n't be sad if you miss out on anything .
